name: Tactical Mind
trigger: when you fail an ability check
effects: you can expend a use of Second Wind to add 1d10 to the check
if the check still fails, the use of Second Wind is not expended
limits: expends Second Wind only on success
notes: This feature replaces the healing effect of Second Wind for that use.
